column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We also ordered the breaded zucchini appetizer.  It was probably the crispiest fried zucchini I've ever had
column2: as it usually turns to mush within a few minutes of serving.  Lou's zucchini held its crispy
column4: and I appreciated that.  It was a bit salty
column6: someone who often cooks her food with restaurant-style sodium levels.
